page.title: 03The Sea
page.content: The Bristol Channel ( or Severn Estuary) has the second highest rise and fall of tide in the world.There is a lot of wildlife here such as birds, tiny creatures,fish and mammals,but you would not think it.The sea is a dirty brown colour but it is only the mud washed down from the hills and it doesn't affect the animals. In 1984 lots of workmen were at Sand Bay building new sea defences.This was done by stacking sand up along the beach.This was to stop the highest tides flooding the houses,which had happened in the past. There are lots of boats on the sea which are mainly speed boats but there are also yachts and fishing boats.Some of the fish that people catch include bass,eels,flounders and dabs.
